verses.verse: Then he brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north:<s%> and he <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was over <S%H5048>against<s%> the separate <S%H1508>place,<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H1146>building<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

Before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> of a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6607>door,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

Over <S%H5048>against<s%> the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> cubits <S%H834>which<s%> were for the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> and, over <S%H5048>against<s%> the <S%H7531>pavement<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was for the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> was <S%H862>gallery<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H862>gallery<s%> in <S%H7992>three<s%> stories.

And <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> was a <S%H4109>walk<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H6442>inward,<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit;<s%> and their <S%H6607>doors<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

Now the <S%H5945>upper<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> were <S%H7114>shorter:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H862>galleries<s%> were <S%H3201>higher<s%> than <S%H4480>these,<s%> <S%H2007><s%> than the <S%H4480>lower,<s%> <S%H8481><s%> and than the <S%H4480>middlemost<s%> <S%H8484><s%> of the <S%H1146>building.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2007>they<s%> were in <S%H8027>three<s%> stories, but had <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> as the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of the <S%H2691>courts:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the building was <S%H680>straitened<s%> more than the <S%H4480>lowest<s%> <S%H8481><s%> and the <S%H8484>middlemost<s%> from the <S%H4480>ground.<s%> <S%H776><s%>

And the <S%H1447>wall<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H2351>without<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H6440>forepart<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> were a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And from <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> was the <S%H3996>entry<s%> on the east <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6921><s%> as one <S%H935>goeth<s%> into <S%H2007>them<s%> from the utter <S%H2691>court.<s%> <S%H2435><s%>

The <S%H3957>chambers<s%> were in the <S%H7341>thickness<s%> of the <S%H1444>wall<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east,<s%> over <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the separate <S%H1508>place,<s%> and over <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1146>building.<s%>

And the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them was like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north,<s%> as <S%H753>long<s%> as they, and <S%H3651>as<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%> as they: and <S%H3605>all<s%> their goings <S%H4161>out<s%> were both according to their <S%H4941>fashions,<s%> and according to their <S%H6607>doors.<s%>

And according to the <S%H6607>doors<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> was a <S%H6607>door<s%> in the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1870>way,<s%> even the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H1903>directly<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1448>wall<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east,<s%> as one <S%H935>entereth<s%> into them.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he <S%H413>unto<s%> me, The <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> and the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the separate <S%H1508>place,<s%> <S%H2007>they<s%> be <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7138>approach<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the most holy <S%H6944>things:<s%> <S%H6944><s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> shall they <S%H5117>lay<s%> the most holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> <S%H6944><s%> and the meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the trespass <S%H817>offering;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> is <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

When the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> therein, then shall they <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4480>holy<s%> <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> but <S%H8033>there<s%> they shall <S%H5117>lay<s%> their <S%H899>garments<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> they <S%H8334>minister;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H2007>they<s%> are <S%H6944>holy;<s%> and shall put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> and shall <S%H7126>approach<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> those things <S%H834>which<s%> are for the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Now when he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> <S%H4060>measuring<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> he brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east,<s%> and <S%H4058>measured<s%> it round <S%H5439>about.<s%> <S%H5439><s%>

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>side<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds,<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H7307>side,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds,<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>
He <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H7307>side,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds,<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>

He turned <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H7307>side,<s%> and <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> it by the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>sides:<s%> it had a <S%H2346>wall<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> <S%H5439><s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> reeds <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7341>broad,<s%> to make a <S%H914>separation<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and the profane <S%H2455>place.<s%>
